chatroomserver

Class ChatRoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • chatroomserver.ChatRoom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ChatRoom
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class handles a specific chat room and its users.

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChatRoom

        public ChatRoom(java.lang.String roomName,
                java.lang.String password)
        Creates a new chat room thread and sets its name.
        Parameters:
        roomName - The name of the chat room.
        password - password for the chat room, "" for no password

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        The main function of the thread. Exiting this function closes the thread. Checks to see if the room is empty every X seconds and returns if it is.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • messageAll

        public void messageAll(java.lang.String message,
                       boolean print)
        Sends a message to all users in the chat room.
        Parameters:
        message - The message that you want to send.
        print - if the server should print the message to the log

      • addUser

        public void addUser(java.lang.String username,
                    java.net.Socket newSock,
                    java.lang.String publicKey)
        Adds a new user to the chat room.
        Parameters:
        username - Username for the new user.
        newSock - The socket of the new user.
        publicKey - public key for the user being added

      • removeUser

        public void removeUser(java.lang.String username)
        Removes the specific user from the chat room.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of who should be removed.

      • kickUser

        public void kickUser(java.lang.String username)
        Kicks a user out of the chat room, can only be called by a moderator. I.E. user 1 in the chat room
        Parameters:
        username -

      • getUsers

        public java.lang.String getUsers()
        Returns a string with all the users in a chat room separated by ';'
        Returns:
        The usernames of everyone in the chat room concatinated together.

      • getKeys

        public java.lang.String getKeys()
                         throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
        Returns string of all public keys in the chat room
        Returns:
        String of all public keys, no delimiters
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
